FLUX is an interactive polling tool. This tool can be used to create quizzes or polls that students can answer in class or at a scheduled time period. If you want to record the response for attendance record or marking purposes, you need to make sure students are signed in. 

Staff and students can log in with their account to flux by going to:

<center>
https://flux.qa/
</center>


## Copying and archiving old polls

You can make a copy of old polls by using the cloning feature as demonstrated in the video below. Similarly, you can archive old polls that are no longer active.
